hero_section.title_2_text: The Ultimate Fitness App for Workouts and Community Support.

fitness_insights.title: Wisdom from our experts
fitness_insights.quote1: Consistency is key. It's better to train moderately four times a week for a year than intensely every day for a month and then quit.
fitness_insights.quote2: Your body achieves what your mind believes. Set clear goals, visualize your success, and let your determination fuel your transformation.
fitness_insights.quote3: The weight room is not just about building muscles, it's about building discipline, resilience, and character that extends beyond fitness.
fitness_insights.quote4: Progress happens when you step outside your comfort zone. Challenge yourself with each workout, and your body will respond with growth.

features.text_1_description: Customized workout and nutrition plans based on user goals.
features.text_2_description: Forum for sharing experiences, tips, and motivation.
features.text_3_description: A single platform for workouts, nutrition, and discussions.

terms_of_service.title: Terms of Service
terms_of_service.introduction: By using our services, you agree to these terms and conditions. Please read them carefully.

acceptanceOfTerms.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptanceOfTerms.content: By accessing or using our platform, you agree to comply with and be bound by these terms and conditions.

accountRegistration.title: 2. Account Registration
accountRegistration.content: To use certain features of our platform, you may need to create an account. You agree to provide accurate and complete information when registering.

useOfServices.title: 3. Use of Our Services
useOfServices.content: You agree to use our services in a lawful manner and not engage in activities that could harm our platform or other users.
list: Do not engage in spamming or phishing activities.
Do not attempt to gain unauthorized access to the platform.

terminationOfAccount.title: 4. Termination of Account
terminationOfAccount.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account if you violate any of these terms or engage in illegal activities.

limitationOfLiability.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.content: We are not responsible for any damages arising from the use or inability to use our services, including data loss or service interruptions.

changesToTerms.title: 6. Changes to the Terms
changesToTerms.content: We may update these terms from time to time. All changes will be posted on this page, and your continued use of the platform will signify your acceptance of the updated terms.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.introduction: Your privacy is important to us. This privacy policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

informationWeCollect.title: 1. Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.content: We collect personal data when you register on our platform, interact with our services, and participate in certain activities.
list: Personal identification information (e.g., name, email address)
Usage data (e.g., IP address, browser type, device information)

howWeUseYourInformation.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
howWeUseYourInformation.content: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:
list: To provide and improve our services
To communicate with you (e.g., customer support, updates)
To personalize your experience on our platform

dataSecurity.title: 3. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We take your data security seriously and implement industry-standard measures to protect your personal information.

yourRights.title: 4. Your Rights
list: Request access to your personal data

changesToThisPolicy.title: 5. Changes to This Policy
changesToThisPolicy.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page.

our_team.desc1: Viktor Kortsanov is the ShredX team leader, young and motivated, always ready to help others achieve their fitness goals with enthusiasm and dedication.
our_team.desc2: Viktor Taskov is a part of the team at ShredX. As a coach, his mission is to reach as wide an audience as possible and help them achieve their goals in a quick and safe manner.
our_team.desc3: Georgi Krastsev is a 32-year-old Senior Full Stack Developer and professional bodybuilder with over 14 years of fitness experience, believing in discipline and consistency to achieve goals.
our_team.desc4: Valentin Petrov is a professional bodybuilder with years of experience and a certified trainer. Passionate about fitness, he combines his expertise in bodybuilding with coaching, helping others achieve their goals through discipline and dedication.

payment_form.payment_text: Secure payment - Your data is protected

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.answer1: ShredX is a fitness platform offering personalized workout programs for various levels and goals. It includes strength, endurance, and flexibility training. ShredX also has a community support forum where users can discuss programs, progress, and get advice from other community members.
faq.question2: How can I start using ShredX?
faq.answer2: To get started, you need to sign up for ShredX by creating a profile. Once registered, you will have access to all available programs and features of the platform.
faq.question3: How can I participate in the ShredX forum?
faq.answer3: To participate in the forum, you need to create a profile on ShredX. Once logged in, you'll have access to all discussions and be able to create new threads and comment.
faq.question4: What payment methods are used in ShredX?
faq.answer4: Payments for the programs in ShredX are made only with credit or debit cards. You can use Visa, MasterCard, and other popular cards.
faq.question5: Can I get a refund after purchasing a program?
faq.answer5: Once you purchase a program, refunds are not offered. Please make sure that the program meets your needs before making a purchase.
